briefTitle: Effect of Cyclic Loading (Vibration) on Orthodontic Tooth Movement
officialTitle: The OrthoAccel (OATI) Celerect Device Pivotal Study - Effect of Cyclic Loading (Vibration) on Orthodontic Tooth Movement
summary: To gather data indicating whether or not the OrthoAccel device speeds tooth movement in people who use orthodontics (braces).

primaryOutcome.measure: The Rate of Orthodontic Movement of a Maxillary Canine Tooth Being Distalized to Close an Extraction Space.
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Time to Space Closure, an average of 22 weeks
